overview:
## Discussion

Unlike the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNImageRequestHandler], this initializer accepts no input because image data and auxiliary parameters may change from frame to frame, and are handled dynamically in the request-handling `perform` methods.

# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a sequence request handler.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Unlike the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNImageRequestHandler], this initializer accepts no input because image data and auxiliary parameters may change from frame to frame, and are handled dynamically in the request-handling `perform` methods.
title: init()
